code: import React from"react";import{Link,useLocation}from"react-router-dom";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Breadcrumb=()=>{const location=useLocation();const pathnames=location.pathname.split("/").filter(x=>x);function capitalizeFirstLetter(val){return String(val).charAt(0).toUpperCase()+String(val).slice(1);}const dictionary={home:"خانه",about:"درباره ما",courses:"کلاس ها",blog:"مقالات",contact:"ارتباط با ما",policy:"منشور قوانین"};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("nav",{className:"text-gray-400 bg-slate-50 px-5 py-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"container flex space-x-2 items-center md:px-16 px-5 para-lil",title:"\u0634\u0645\u0627 \u0627\u06CC\u0646\u062C\u0627 \u0647\u0633\u062A\u06CC\u062F.",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/",className:"hover:underline  hover:text-slate-700 me-2",children:"\u062E\u0627\u0646\u0647"}),pathnames.map((segment,index)=>{const to="/".concat(pathnames.slice(0,index+1).join("/"));const isLast=index===pathnames.length-1;if(segment in dictionary){segment=dictionary[segment];}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(React.Fragment,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"mx-2",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"fa-duotone fa-solid fa-sword rotate-[225deg]"})}),isLast?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-gray-600",children:capitalizeFirstLetter(decodeURIComponent(segment).replaceAll("-"," "))}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:to,className:"hover:underline hover:text-slate-700",children:capitalizeFirstLetter(decodeURIComponent(segment).replaceAll("-"," "))})]},to);})]})});};export default Breadcrumb;
